an4.58:4.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.58:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4.58:5.1: “Bhojanaṃ, gahapati, dadamāno ariyasāvako paṭiggāhakānaṃ cattāri ṭhānāni deti.
an4.58:5.3: Āyuṃ deti, vaṇṇaṃ deti, sukhaṃ deti, balaṃ deti.
an4.58:5.4: Āyuṃ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an4.58:5.5: Vaṇṇaṃ datvā … sukhaṃ datvā … balaṃ datvā balassa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an4.58:5.6: Bhojanaṃ, gahapati, dadamāno ariyasāvako paṭiggāhakānaṃ imāni cattāri ṭhānāni detīti.
an4.58:6.1: * Yo saññatānaṃ paradattabhojinaṃ,
an4.58:7.1: So āyudāyī vaṇṇadāyī,
an4.58:7.2: sukhaṃ balaṃ dado naro;
